mechanics.trigger: Attempt to create or transmit sound
mechanics.condition: Location is within or attempting to pass through the 20-foot radius sphere
mechanics.outcome: No sound can be created or pass through

mechanics.condition: Creature or object is entirely inside the 20-foot radius sphere
Creature is entirely inside the 20-foot radius sphere
Spell has a verbal component AND Caster is entirely inside the 20-foot radius sphere

description_text: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.
